Icon.Name: ID26646
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26646 -102.00,-12.00,-169.00 ''A dingy mess hall filled with rowdy and stone-drunk Steelslave orcs enjoying a break from their menial existance.'' Level 50-51 Solo.

Icon.Name: ID26647
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26647 -163.00,-19.00,-210.00 ''A wretched stench fills the air. This must be where the orcs throw their refuse. A colony of carrion oozes has moved in.'' Level 50 Solo.

Icon.Name: ID26648
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26648 -90.00,-24.00,-274.00 ''Steelslave laborers hide from their masters, swapping stories around this natural spring. The water is not all too pure...'' Level 50-51 Solo.

Icon.Name: ID26649
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26649 -3.00,-5.00,-173.00 ''Lowly orcs toil over hot ovens preparing dog soup while enduring the presence of a drunkard named Lakkh.'' Level 50-52 Solo.

Icon.Name: ID26650
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26650 14.00,-5.00,-66.00 ''The Overseer of the Steelslaves seems to have a bunk here. Regular trips up the Lift to meet with his commanders, and their demands to keep the slaves working prevent him from getting any rest.'' Level 52 ^ Solo.

Icon.Name: ID26651
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26651 72.00,-22.00,-135.00 ''These unfortunates mine the precious crystals and ores beneath the Clefts, ever regretting the day they fell asleep on watch. Maulers look after them to make sure they keep up the work.'' Level 50-51 Solo.

Icon.Name: ID26652
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26652 61.00,1.00,145.00 ''Here are all the supplies necessary for work in the tunnels to continue, as well as the slaves savvy enough to get out of mine duty.'' Level 50-51 Solo.

Icon.Name: ID26653
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26653 -265.00,-13.00,6.00 ''Here are held creatures too dangerous to pen with others while the orcs decide whether to train them or eat them.'' Level 50-51 Solo.

Icon.Name: ID26654
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26654 -190.00,-10.00,17.00 ''Outsiders that are found meddling in orc matters may end up in these pens, if they are lucky. Perhaps they will be sold for ransom, perhaps they will end up in the soup pots. Escape is not unknown, however...'' Level 50-51 Solo.

Icon.Name: ID26655
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26655 -126.00,-7.00,57.00 ''Off duty watchers and maulers rest their feet and sharpen their weapons after a long day looking after miners and prisoners.'' Level 50-51 Solo.

Icon.Name: ID26657
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26657 -21.00,16.00,77.00 ''Under the hot sun, Steelslave toilers continue to mine the cliffs under the watchful eye of the pit bosses. Lazy orcs have been known to be thrown off to their deaths.'' Level 52 ^^^ Heroic.

Icon.Name: ID26658
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26658 -120.00,15.00,-50.00 ''Under the hot sun, Steelslave toilers continue to mine the cliffs under the watchful eye of the pit bosses. The minerals are hoisted up and down by giant lifts.'' Level 52 ^^^ Heroic.

Icon.Name: ID26659
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26659 -110.00,15.00,-180.00 ''While not as skilled as the Crushbone or Deathfist orcs, the Steelslave clan is still a force to be reckoned with. Here is where their elite warriors await the next battle.'' Level 53 ^^^ Heroic.

Icon.Name: ID26660
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26660 -65.00,8.00,-267.00 ''Led by the Apothecary, the Spiritbound orc shamans research the magical properties of the various crystals mined by the lesser clans.'' Level 53 ^^^ Heroic.

Icon.Name: ID26661
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:26661 113.14,17.50,-154.20 ''Within this imposing cavern, Blademaster Thul leads the Steelslave orcs in martial arts and sword drills. Orcs are forever training for their next war.'' Level 52 ^^^ Heroic.

Icon.Name: ID26662

Learning The Way kill 15 Ashen Diciples, you must enter the Instanced Zone: The Ashen Elite Training Grounds and speak to Jun Shan, Master Lu Ree, Lee Chen Tao Rae. Once you attain 50K status, speak to Master Kiri (60^^^ Heroic Ashen Order Monk) for your Jade Dragon title.
